body: ... The author better give the hell timeline (I assume it is a timeline thing, because it seems that way) a happy/better ending (doesn't have to be happy happy, but being together at least :P )... or I will be sadge.
In the end of the world, they doing the right thing, keep breeding and rebuild humanity
If you pretend the √hell chapter never existed, these two can just live happily ever after doing their own thing.
